alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 11 at 12:57PM EST until November 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Melbourne FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Little Wekiva River near Altamonte Springs 2n affecting Seminole County. .Heavy rainfall associated with Nicole has caused river levels to rise on the Little Wekiva River. Drainage from surrounding areas has caused levels to continue a gradual rise, with the potential for Moderate Flood Stage to be reached later tonight or Saturday. For the Little Wekiva...including Altamonte Springs 2n...Moderate flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2n. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Moderate flooding between State Road 434 and State Road 436, with water covering roads and entering low lying homes near the river. Flooding also occurring in the Clemson Drive and Lake Brantley areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 28.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 29.2 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 28.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 hour) Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7pm 1am 7am 1pm 7pm Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2 28.5 28.5 Fri 12 pm 29.1 29.1 28.8 28.4 28.0 &&
